A number is divisible by 11 if:
options: Sum of digits is divisible by 11
Difference of sum of digits at odd and even places is divisible by 11
Sum of alternate digits is divisible by 11
Product of first and last digit is divisible by 11
questions.answer: Difference of sum of digits at odd and even places is divisible by 11

A number is divisible by 4 if:
options: Last two digits are divisible by 4
Sum of digits is divisible by 4
First two digits are divisible by 4
questions.answer: Last two digits are divisible by 4

questions.question: The smallest 5-digit number which is exactly divisible by 41 is:

options: Sum of digits is divisible by 5

The average of 20 numbers is 15 and the average of first 10 numbers is 12. What is the average of the last 10 numbers?
The average age of a family of 5 members is 28 years. If the age of the youngest member is 8 years, what is the average age of the family excluding the youngest member?

The average of four consecutive even numbers is 27. What is the largest of these numbers?

If A is 30% more than B, then B is what percent less than A?
If the price of a commodity increases by 25%, by what percentage should the consumption be reduced to maintain the same expenditure?

What percent of 120 is 90?
If A's salary is 25% more than B's salary, by what percent is B's salary less than A's?
If 60% of a number is 450, what is 80% of the same number?

The price of a commodity is reduced by 10%. By what percentage should it be increased to bring it back to the original price?
In an exam, 60% of the students passed in Math and 70% passed in Science. If 40% passed in both subjects, what percent of students failed in both subjects?
A shopkeeper sold an article at 20% profit. Had it been sold for Rs. 100 more, the profit would have been 30%. What is the cost price of the article?
